00075 
00076 template <class T, class ids> mfVector<T,ids>::mfVector(ids block_size)
00077 {
00078         MF_ASSERT(block_size > 0);
00079         block = block_size;
00080 
00081         vetor = new T*[block];
00082 
00083         MF_ASSERT(vetor);
00084 
00085         for(ids index=0; index < block; index++)
00086                 vetor[index] = NULL;
00087 
00088         nt = ntmax = 0;
00089         hasfree = false;
00090 }
00091 
00092 template <class T, class ids> mfVector<T,ids>::~mfVector()
00093 {
00094         for(ids index=0; index < block; index++)
00095                 if(vetor[index])
00096                         delete [] vetor[index];
00097 
00098                 delete [] vetor;
00099 }
00100 
00101 template <class T, class ids> T& mfVector<T,ids>::operator [](ids index)
00102 {
00103         MF_ASSERT(index >= 0);
00104 
00105         if(vetor[index / block])
00106                 return vetor[index / block][index % block];
00107         else
00108         {
00109                 vetor[index / block] = new T[block];
00110                 MF_ASSERT(vetor[index / block]);
00111                 return vetor[index / block][index % block];
00112         }
00113 }
00114 
00115 template <class T, class ids> ids mfVector<T,ids>::getFree()
00116 {
00117         ids i;
00118 
00119         if (!hasfree)
00120         {
00121                 i = ntmax;
00122                 ntmax++;
00123         }
00124         else
00125         {
00126                 i = first;
00127 
00128                 if(last == first)
00129                         hasfree = false;
00130                 else
00131 #ifdef MF_THREADS
00132                         first = (*this)[i].getPosition(false);
00133 #else
00134                         first = (*this)[i].getPosition();
00135 #endif
00136         }
00137 
00138 #ifdef MF_THREADS
00139         (*this)[i].setInMesh(true, false);
00140 #else
00141         (*this)[i].setInMesh(true);
00142 #endif
00143         nt++;
00144 
00145         return i;
00146 }
00147         
00148 template <class T, class ids> void mfVector<T,ids>::setSize(ids size)
00149 {
00150         if(ntmax < size)
00151                 ntmax = size; 
00152 
00153         nt = size;
00154 }
00155 
00156 template <class T, class ids> ids mfVector<T,ids>::getSize()
00157 {
00158         return nt;
00159 }
00160 
00161 template <class T, class ids> ids mfVector<T,ids>::getMaxId()
00162 {
00163         return ntmax;
00164 }

00166 template <class T, class ids> bool mfVector<T,ids>::free(ids index)
00167 {
00168         MF_ASSERT(index >= 0);
00169 
00170         T* v = &(*this)[index];
00171 
00172         MF_ASSERT(v->inMesh());
00173         if(hasfree)
00174         {
00175 #ifdef MF_THREADS
00176                 v->setPosition(first, false);
00177 #else
00178                 v->setPosition(first);
00179 #endif
00180                 first = index;
00181         }
00182         else
00183         {
00184 #ifdef MF_THREADS
00185         v->setInMesh(false, false);
00186 #else
00187         v->setInMesh(false);
00188 #endif
00189                 hasfree = true;
00190                 first = index;
00191                 last = first;
00192         }
00193         nt--;
00194 
00195         return true;
00196 }
